title: Quick JBang Scripting With IntelliJ Idea
content: This quick article shows how to install and use JBang’s IntelliJ Idea plugin to create JBang projects and scripts in no time. Firstly, to get started quickly with JBang, we recommend having a look at this article: JBang: Create Java scripts like a pro Next, let’s see how to install JBang Plugin on IntelliJ Idea ...  The post appeared first on .
